<a id="StatusIndicator"></a>

# StatusIndicator

**Inherits:** [Node](Node.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Application status indicator (aka notification area icon).

\ **Note:** Status indicator is implemented on macOS and Windows.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

<!-- classref-signal -->

**pressed**\ (\ mouse_button\: [int](int.md), mouse_position\: [Vector2i](Vector2i.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#StatusIndicator_signal_pressed)

Emitted when the status indicator is pressed.

## Property Descriptions

<a id="StatusIndicator_property_icon"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Texture2D](Texture2D.md) **icon** [ðŸ”—](#StatusIndicator_property_icon)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_icon**\ (\ value\: [Texture2D](Texture2D.md)\ )
- [Texture2D](Texture2D.md) **get_icon**\ (\ )

Status indicator icon.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="StatusIndicator_property_menu"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[NodePath](NodePath.md) **menu** = `NodePath("")` [ðŸ”—](#StatusIndicator_property_menu)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_menu**\ (\ value\: [NodePath](NodePath.md)\ )
- [NodePath](NodePath.md) **get_menu**\ (\ )

Status indicator native popup menu. If this is set, the [pressed](StatusIndicator.md#StatusIndicator_signal_pressed) signal is not emitted.

\ **Note:** Native popup is only supported if [NativeMenu](NativeMenu.md) supports [NativeMenu.FEATURE_POPUP_MENU](NativeMenu.md#NativeMenu_constant_FEATURE_POPUP_MENU) feature.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="StatusIndicator_property_tooltip"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_tooltip**\ (\ value\: [String](String.md)\ )
- [String](String.md) **get_tooltip**\ (\ )

Status indicator tooltip.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="StatusIndicator_property_visible"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **visible** = `true` [ðŸ”—](#StatusIndicator_property_visible)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_visible**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **is_visible**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the status indicator is visible.

<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="StatusIndicator_method_get_rect"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Rect2](Rect2.md) **get_rect**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#StatusIndicator_method_get_rect)

Returns the status indicator rectangle in screen coordinates. If this status indicator is not visible, returns an empty [Rect2](Rect2.md).
